dmca.title: Copyright Violation
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Kirk and Donna [mailto:KirkandDonna@hotmail.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 23, 2007 10:16 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: Copyright Violation

 

April 23, 2007

Andrea Z. Almeida, Agent

The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc.

1333 Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, Texas 75207

Tel: 214-782-7800

Fax: 214-782-7756

copyright@theplanet.com

Dear Ms. Almeida:

Kirk and Donna Crawford are the exclusive owners of the photographs
displayed on their website, http://www.KirkandDonna.com/ This letter
shall serve to notify you of a copyright violation contained on the
website: http://209.62.2.210/sportcunt/.
<http://209.62.2.210/sportcunt/>  

The website contains two photographs that were taken and used without
the authorization of the owners, Kirk and Donna Crawford. The first
photograph is a cropped version of a photograph
(http://farm1.static.flickr.com/131/370213389_15ca4c6b7a.jpg) which
appeared on Kirk's website through his Flickr account. The first
photograph has been embedded in some sort of flash program. The second
photograph was taken from their Round-the-World trip page
(http://www.kirkanddonna.com/rtw/pics/0311DMZVinhMocCave.jpg and depicts
Mrs. Crawford in a Cave in Vietnam. 

We strenuously object to the unauthorized use of their copyrighted
material on this website and have no intention of providing
authorization for such use. Furthermore, there is no fair use policy
that would allow the use of these photographs. 

Finally, we insist on the immediate removal of the photographs from the
infringing website listed above. 

The above is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge, under
penalty of law, and I am authorize to act on the behalf of Kirk and
Donna Crawford. 

The Crawfords may be contacted at the following address:

Kirk and Donna Crawford

P.O. Box 781

Hermosa Beach, CA 90254-0781

tel: 310-798-5433

email: KirkandDonna@KirkandDonna.com

Very Truly Yours,

Donna Crawford
